title: Mountain Adventure
description: Explore the breathtaking mountain landscapes. Most mountain landscape photos are a splash of colors in the shades of green and yellow. In fact, the charms of mountains and forests are their changing faces, which can look vital, serene or sometimes desolate. The photo below was taken with a telephoto lens to create a desolate mood. It captured a special scene in the wild when the snow danced in the wind, creating a mist covering the woods.
